Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Gastrointestinal Disorder/Intestinal Disorder/Intestinal Precancerous Condition/Inflammatory Bowel Disease/Ulcerative Colitis
Record.Description: Inflammation of the COLON that is predominantly confined to the MUCOSA. Its major symptoms include DIARRHEA, rectal BLEEDING, the passage of MUCUS, and ABDOMINAL PAIN.
